trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as the base class for the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 추상 기본 클래스로 사용 되는 추상 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to fill the background of the content area.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> 콘텐츠 영역의 배경을 채울 하는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 가능한 미리 정의 된 브러시 색 견본 테이블, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`||

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to not use a background brush.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠 영역의 배경을 채우는 데 사용 되는 브러시 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 배경 브러시를 사용 하지 않도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the element.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> 요소에 있는 콘텐츠 끝을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A> property is often used to append content to the end of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>속성은 콘텐츠 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> 의 끝에 추가 하는 데 자주 사용</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the start of content in the element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A> property is often used to insert content to the beginning of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>속성은 종종 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> 의 시작 부분에 콘텐츠를 삽입 사용</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the start of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the element.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> 요소의 끝 바로 다음 위치를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> 의 끝 바로 다음 위치를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the element.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> 요소의 시작 부분 바로 전에 위치를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"> </xref> 의 시작 부분 바로 앞의 위치를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 콘텐츠에 대 한 기본 최상위 글꼴 패밀리를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 기본 글꼴 패밀리 또는 이상의 대체 글꼴 패밀리가 있는 주 기본 글꼴 패밀리 하나를 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the font determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 의해 결정 된 글꼴의 <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 콘텐츠에 대 한 글꼴 크기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.
trans-unit.target: 원하는 글꼴 사용할 크기를 장치 독립적 픽셀, 0.001 보다 크고 35791 보다 작거나 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 기본 현재 시스템 설정에 따라 다르며에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: FontSize is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.
trans-unit.target: FontSize 35791 보다 큰 값으로 설정 된 0.001 보다 작거나 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font-stretching characteristics for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 콘텐츠에 대 한 글꼴 확대 특성을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> structure that specifies the desired font-stretching characteristics to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> 사용 하려는 글꼴 확장 특성을 지정 하는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font style for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 콘텐츠에 대 한 글꼴 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyles"></xref> class that specifies the desired font style.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyles"> </xref> 원하는 글꼴 스타일을 지정 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the top-level font weight for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 콘텐츠에 대 한 최상위 글꼴 두께 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeights"></xref> class that specifies the desired font weight.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeights"> </xref> 원하는 글꼴 두께 지정 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to apply to the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> 를 요소의 내용에 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The brush used to apply to the text contents.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 콘텐츠에 적용 하는 데 사용 되는 브러시입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> attached property for a specified dependency object.

Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical children of the element.
trans-unit.target: 논리 자식 요소를 반복할 수 있는 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for the logical children.
Handles notifications that one or more of the dependency properties that exist on the element have had their effective values changed.
trans-unit.target: 요소에 존재 하는 종속성 속성의 하나 이상의 유효 값이 변경 되어가 알림을 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Arguments associated with the property value change.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값과 연결 된 인수를 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property*> property specifies which property has changed, the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue*> property specifies the previous property value, and the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*> property specifies the new property value.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 속성 변경 된 속성을 지정는 <> </> *> 이전 속성 값을 지정 하는 속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*>속성 새 속성 값을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*>

d is .
Adds a child object.
The child object to add.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 있는 노드의 텍스트 콘텐츠를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소 콘텐츠에 적용할 텍스트 효과 컬렉션을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to `null` and has no <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 속성 설정 `null` 되었고 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>이와 관련 된</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> 없습니다

trans-unit.source: Before adding any text effects, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> and assign it to this property.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 효과 추가 하기 전에 새 만들려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>이 속성에 할당 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> containing one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"> </xref> 하나 이상 포함 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"> </xref> 이 요소의 콘텐츠에 적용할 효과를 정의 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> (not an empty collection).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> (빈 컬렉션이 아님).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 콘텐츠에 대 한 현재 유효한 입력 체계 변형을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A> property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts.
A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant.
trans-unit.target: 입력 체계 variant variant를 지원 하지 않는 글꼴에는 영향이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 항목에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [wpf에서 입력 체계](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref> object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"> </xref> 현재 유효한 입력 체계 변형을 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: For a list of default typography values, see <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 목록이 기본 입력 체계 값에 대 한 참조 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"> </xref>합니다.
